description: Unique identifier of the asset covered by this warranty; links to the master asset record.
Categorization of the asset to contextualize warranty terms and meter units.
Internal warranty header identifier for the asset; groups related coverage lines. Likely a warranty header key; confirm with SME.
Sequence number of a coverage line within a warranty, ordering multiple entries under the same header.
Code indicating the warranty category or coverage type; organization-specific code set. Confirm with SME.
Identifier of the supplier or manufacturer providing the warranty; references the vendor master.
Date the warranty coverage ends, after which claims are not honored.
External reference number assigned by the warranty provider or manufacturer, if available.
Narrative description of the warranty coverage scope or plan.
Reference to an attached document or file associated with the warranty (e.g., certificate, terms).
User or process that created the warranty record.
Timestamp when the warranty record was created.
User who last modified the warranty record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification to the warranty record.
Date the warranty coverage begins.
Free-text remarks related to this warranty entry.
Contract or policy identifier associated with the warranty agreement.
Reminder date to prompt action before expiration (e.g., notifications). Confirm with SME.
Usage reading at which the warranty expires (miles, hours, or cycles) relative to the start meter; unit varies by asset type.
Assetâ€™s meter reading at warranty start, used to determine usage-based expiration.
